projects.description: Contributed to the development of app.geo.ca v2, a responsive GIS catalogue built with SvelteKit, SST, and AWS.
bulletPoints: Developed reusable and reactive UI components (tables, forms, modals, carousels, map cart) using Svelte and Tailwind.
Implemented back-end solutions to query and parse data from NRCan's GeoCore database and optimized routing with SvelteKit.
Tested, debugged, and refined lambda functions used to create and populate AWS S3 buckets.
Applied design updates from wireframes and user feedback.
Occasionally contributed minor components and bug fixes to related projects such as NRCan's GeoView platform.
Maintained and upgraded project dependencies (Svelte, SST, Tailwind).

projects.projectName: NRCan - Canadian Geospatial Platform Pygeoapi Application
projects.description: Developed a metadata search platform using pygeoapi based on updated OGC API standards.
bulletPoints: Built WCAG-compliant frontend UI with Jinja templates, Vue.js, and WET-inspired design elements.
Implemented new features, such as the ability to isolate map features using data table checkboxes, and sorting table results from the server-side responses.
Refactored an existing backend provider to access and parse Canadian Geospatial Platform (cgp) data.
Addressed user-requested enhancements and bug fixes.

projects.projectName: Transport Canada - Enhanced Maritime Situational Awareness
projects.description: Supported development of a web-based GIS platform for real-time maritime monitoring in collaboration with coastal and Indigenous communities.
bulletPoints: Built custom mapping tools and forms using JavaScript and OpenLayers (e.g., graticules, dead reckoning, buffers, context menus).
Developed and maintained PostGIS-enabled database features using Python and SQLAlchemy.
Designed automated test cases with TestCafe to support frontend QA and debugging.

projects.description: Developed a full-stack web app to streamline HR onboarding processes by replacing paper forms with secure, digital workflows.
bulletPoints: Developed frontend forms and backend logic, including a user authentication system.
Created automated tests to support debugging and ensure cross-browser compatibility.

projects.projectName: Friends of Laura Secord Legacy Trail Mapping Project
projects.description: Supported development of public trail maps by collecting and analyzing geospatial data.
bulletPoints: Captured precise trail data using Trimble GPS and created 3D terrain models.
Rated trail difficulty based on spatial analysis.
Produced printable thematic maps for public navigation.
